capability.name: Ebranch Operations
capability.definition: This service domain operates the bank's on-line web based electronic branch capabilities - controlling access and load balancing across available communications and processing resources to optimize performance/availability
capability.role: This service domain operates the E-branch production systems conforming to planned service schedules. It handles customer and non-customer access checks, performs device load balancing and device failure and recovery handling - typically supporting a high performance 24/7 operation. It can include the integration of computer telephony integration (CTI) with branch and call center channels
capability.example: customers and non-bank customers browse the products and services available at the bank
